author: cms-tau-pog
body:
#### PR description:

This PR it to store novel DeepTauIDs computed at MiniAOD step to NanoAOD tables. 
It can be seen as an follow up action to  #26796

Expected changes: six new variables are added to tau table in NanoAOD - three raw values (float numbers) of tau discriminants against jets, electrons and muons misidentified as taus, and three integer numbers encoding corresponding WPs. 
NanoAOD for old eras should not be modified and should work on top of corresponding MiniAOD inputs not containing DeepTauID variables.

Backport to 10_6_X for UL will follow shortly.

#### PR validation:

NanoAOD workflows were tested.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

N/A
title: Store DeepTauID in NanoAOD
